      isObjectField in interface SearchIndexNodeContext<S extends AbstractIndexValueField<S,SC,FT,C,F>>
      Returns:
      true if this field is an object field. In that case, IndexFieldDescriptor.toObjectField() can be called safely (it won't throw an exception).
